description: Delve into the legal complexities surrounding Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), including issues related to intellectual property rights, regulatory challenges, taxation implications, smart contracts, and data privacy. This comprehensive analysis explores how NFTs are navigating existing legal frameworks while shaping digital ownership.
keywords: NFTs, legal aspects, intellectual property, regulatory challenges, taxation, smart contracts, data privacy, copyright issues, securities law, anti-money laundering, capital gains, GDPR compliance, jurisdiction, international standards
title: Legal Aspects of NFTs: Navigating Challenges and Opportunities
